parameters: Why the hell are you smiling?
Why our cat's all\.\. sick and stuff...
I can't have that, I can't!
you in a pretty rough place...?
If anyone's in a rough place,
don't need to cover for Albert like that...
I mean, Albert has to take on
what he doesn't care about. Or treasure.
Get it?\.\. That's why he can
will all be hideous! All be miserable!
you hear me?!\.\. I feel bad for him!
I know what's important to me,
so I'm not in a rough place!
Even our cat you told me about...
I know how important she is to me!
How dear she is to me!
important to me to the very end,
And when he did, I would
I hated my brother so much,
and the pain made it feel like
I was the one going crazy...
If I could just get a glimpse of her...
Just spend some time with her...
No matter how much it hurts,
no matter how bad the weather.
When I was about to lose it,
It wasn't that she wouldn't come.
I grit my teeth through it all.
There was nothing I could do,
but it all hurt a little.
And when it hurt, and I saw her,
my heart would fill with joy.
But every time I saw her,
I mean, I haven't told her
And how can I, when she won't
